name: Loops & Lattes Hiking Guides Collingwood, the Blue Mountains & Beaver Valley
categories: Collingwood, the Blue Mountains& Beaver Vall
description: Discover a short 1km stroll or a full day of over 20km. This guide covers the forests, meadows and vistas around Georgian Bay, with detailed maps, directions, and colour photos for each of the 35 hiking loops described. It also includes recommended places to grab lunch or coffee before or after your adventures.
